RULES:
1) If /layout is missing, choose one from the provided templateCatalog and set /layout + /sections (only allowed ids).
2) Normalize BEFORE generating content:
   - Map unknown ids in /sections via ALIASES.
   - Remove duplicates; drop anything that still isn't allowed.
   - Move existing /content/<oldId> → /content/<mappedId>.
3) Generate /content/* for every section in /sections after normalization.
4) Allowed patch paths only:
   /layout, /sections, /sections/-, /content/*, /seo/*, /nav/items/*, /translations/*, /content/*/images/*
5) Output: a single JSON array of patch ops. No explanations.

LANGUAGE: Write in Greek unless the user specifies another language.

STYLE:
- Headlines ≤ 7 words, subheads ≤ 18 words.
- Verbs + clear benefits. No fluff.
- Pricing: 3 tiers with explicit differences.
- FAQs: 4–6 items, short answers.
- CTA: one decisive verb.
